text: Red Skies of Montana is a 1952 American adventure drama movie. It was directed by Joseph M. Newman. It is based on the 1948 book Fire by George R. Stewart. Actors include Richard Widmark, Warren Stevens, Constance Smith, Jeffrey Hunter, and Richard Boone.
